item.description:
Sitecore's Dreamcore 2010 Conference starts on Thursday morning, 4/22.

The night before, the Sitecore New England User Group will raise its flag and welcome attendees with a come one, come all Meet Up / Tweet Up at The Rattlesnake Bar at 384 Boylston Street, just around the corner from the host hotel (Boston Park Plaza).

Help us make a great showing in our home city and welcome other Sitecore developers, user group members and MVPs to Boston. Even if you're not attending Dreamcore, come to the Meet Up - free food (and maybe some drinks too). Here are the details:

- Dreamcore Meet Up / Tweet Up in Boston, Wed., April 21 7-10 PM
- Host: Sitecore New England User Group & ISITE Design
- Location: The Rattlesnake (second floor)
- 384 Boylston Street, Boston (Between Arlington and Berkeley)

What: Hoist a pint with Sitecore Dreamcore attendees the night before the conference begins! Come to the Dreamcore Meet Up/Tweet Up hosted by the Sitecore New England User Group & ISITE Design. Drop in from 7-10 pm at The Rattlesnake, just a two minute walk from the Park Plaza Hotel. We'll have a private room on the second floor; bar food provided!

Meet other Sitecore users, developers and User Group members from around the USA.
item.how_to_find_us: We will have a reserved area
item.name: April 2010 Sitecore Meetup - New Details - Tweetup at the Rattlesnake
